Module project.chenlin_17

Package project.chenlin_17.tools

package project.chenlin_17.tools
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    project.chenlin_17

  • Class
    Description
    BrickFactory
    Only defined constructor of the brick building is allowed.
    Each constructor has its set value for brick settings.
    CharacterOptions
    Each constructor set have its defined value for character image and paddle image, since they are designed to bind with each other.
    The player is able to set the paddle image by choosing the character
    Record
    This class for the player's game record, which includes the name, score and created time.
    SceneFactory
    This is the helper class for building the world and pre character option view for the character chosen page.
    It aims at code reusing and uses the Factory Pattern.
    SceneOptions
    Each constructor has its set value for brickSets,background music,background image and ball image.
    The enum name stands for the specific theme choice.
    SoundEffect
    The player is only allowed to hear the specific music defined in this class
